fields.soul_force: Integer; determines rank via cultivator rules
fields.rank: Derived from soul_force using standard rank thresholds
fields.attribute: Must be from valid attribute list (e.g., Fire, Water, Neutral)

bloodline.quality: Matches bloodline system (e.g., Common, Rare, Legendary)

awakened_knowledge.condition: Only applies if bloodline is Legendary+ AND rank is Legendary+

demon_beast_definition.notes: This defines all fields a valid demon beast must have.
